segments.text: I observe the details in this line drawing of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The upper cabinets are open, revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing the stool to get to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is extended, one hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks unstable, leaning back slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Beside him, the girl has her palm up, expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: At the sink, the woman polishes her plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water overflows copiously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It streams down the cabinets and pools on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in it without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a tidy garden scene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm outside and chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the kids might get hurt in their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
